text: American actor Hilary Duff has given birth to a beautiful baby girl, named Banks Violet Bair. On October 25, the 31 - year - old star welcomed Banks with her boyfriend Matthew Koma at her Los Angeles home. Duff took to her official Instagram account to share the happy news with her fans. She posted a photo, in which the couple can be seen all smiles holding the little one. ` ` Banks Violet Bair, this little bit has fully stolen our hearts! She joined our world at home on Thursday afternoon and is absolute magic,'' she wrote alongside the picture. She also shared a picture on her Instagram story giving her fans a closer look at her baby.
